# BBB Roofing Contractor Scraper

This project scrapes business data from BBB.org to collect roofing contractor records.

## Quick Start

1. Install dependencies:
   ```
   pip install -r requirements.txt
   ```

2. Run Phase 1 (test scrape - 300 records):
   ```
   python main.py --phase 1
   ```

3. Check output in `data/phase1_records.csv`

## Documentation

- See [README.md](README.md) for full documentation
- See [config.py](config.py) for configuration options

## Status

This is a fully functional Python scraper project ready for Phase 1 implementation.
